<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove a contact from the project"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/contact/{contactid:[0-9]+}/project/{projectid:[0-9]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes a link to the selected project from the contact with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"contactid":{"description":"Contact ID","type":"integer"},"projectid":{"description":"Project ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
